title: System Protect 1.0
description:
SYSTEM PROTECT
                             ==============

Prevent Accidental Deletion of Critical Files

Ensure operating system and software stability

- Get deletion attempt alerts
- Automatic updates keep critical files safe
- Works with other security programs
- Comes in multi-languages
- Protects files and folders
- Select files to protect


System Requirements
====================
To install System Protect, you will need at least 10MB of free space on your disk drive and 800x600 pixels minimum screen resolution.

To use System Protect functions you will need to have one of the following operating systems installed on your computer:

Microsoft Windows XP 32-bit, Windows XP 64-bit, Windows Vista 32-bit or Microsoft Windows 7.


Installation Notes: Double-click the setup file and follow instructions. Make sure the program is always running in the background to prevent deletion of your files.

                            HYPERDRIVE25 TORRENT
